thread.title: Portland Metro Monday Forecast: Heavy fog in the morning burning off to bright sun
thread.title_full: Portland Metro Monday Forecast: Heavy fog in the morning burning off to bright sun | OregonLive.com

author: Rosemarie Stein | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland Metro Monday Forecast: Heavy fog in the morning burning off to bright sun
text:
It's murky out there to start your Monday with heavy fog in many areas and low visibility.
Much like yesterday, the fog should burn away by early afternoon leaving us with a bright day and a high of 70.
Most of the week ahead looks sunny and very mild for mid-October. Current forecasts show Thursday and Friday reaching toward highs of 80 degrees. Of course, it's still Monday â€“ so no firm bets yet.
Over night lows are staying mild as well with temperatures hovering around 50. No frost on the pumpkins yet.
